Nature & Structure.title: Dicipta by Allah as a real place
Nature & Structure.quote: Indeed, those who disbelieve in Our verses â€” We will drive them into a Api.
Nature & Structure.explanation: Neraka is an actual place of Hukuman, Disediakan by Allah for the disbelievers.

Nature & Structure.title: Tujuh gates of Neraka
Nature & Structure.quote: Indeed, Neraka has Tujuh gates, and each Pintu gerbang has its group of Rakyat assigned to it.
Nature & Structure.explanation: Each type of Orang kafir has a Pintu gerbang corresponding to their deeds.

Nature & Structure.title: Walls Mengelilingi dwellers
Nature & Structure.quote: Indeed, We have Disediakan for the wrongdoers a Api whose walls will Mengelilingi them.
Nature & Structure.explanation: The flames Mengurungi them completely; there is no Melarikan diri.

Nature & Structure.title: Flames Mengaung like a wild beast
Nature & Structure.quote: When it sees them from a distant place, they will Mendengar its fury and roaring.
Nature & Structure.explanation: Neraka itself is described as roaring in rage, resembling a living beast.

Nature & Structure.title: Sealed and closed over them
Nature & Structure.quote: Indeed, it is upon them closed down, in extended columns.
Nature & Structure.explanation: The gates are shut permanently; no Melarikan diri is possible.

Nature & Structure.title: Multiple levels with varying Hukuman
Nature & Structure.quote: Indeed, the hypocrites will be in the lowest depths of the Api.
Nature & Structure.explanation: Neraka has layers corresponding to the sins and disbelief of its dwellers.

Nature & Structure.title: Immense size, covering vast areas
Nature & Structure.quote: Its gates will be seventy thousand reins, each held by seventy thousand angels.
Nature & Structure.explanation: Neraka's enormity emphasizes the scale of Hukuman.

Nature & Structure.title: Darkness and Asap
Nature & Structure.quote: It will be covered with Asap, in which they will be enclosed.
Nature & Structure.explanation: The environment is suffocating and terrifying.

Nature & Structure.title: Flames like towering columns
Nature & Structure.quote: The Api will Naik in towering columns.
Nature & Structure.explanation: The Api's Struktur emphasizes its immense Kuasa.

Nature & Structure.title: Neraka is Kekal
Nature & Structure.quote: Indeed, Allah will Menghukum them forever in the Api.
Nature & Structure.explanation: Hukuman is unending for disbelievers and persistent sinners.

Entry & Guardians.title: Disbelievers driven in groups
Entry & Guardians.quote: And those who disbelieved will be driven to Neraka in groups.
Entry & Guardians.explanation: Rakyat are herded into Neraka together, like animals, highlighting humiliation.

Entry & Guardians.title: Guarded by Malik
Entry & Guardians.quote: They will call, 'O Malik! Membenarkan your Lord put an Menamatkan to us!' He will say, 'Indeed, you will Kekal.'
Entry & Guardians.explanation: Malik is the chief angel of Neraka, overseeing its punishments.

Entry & Guardians.title: Angels execute Hukuman precisely
Entry & Guardians.quote: Indeed, We have sent down angels who are stern and do not Derhaka Allah.
Entry & Guardians.explanation: Angels Mengikuti Allah's Memerintah perfectly, ensuring Hukuman is exact.

Entry & Guardians.title: Angels are strict and unyielding
Entry & Guardians.quote: They do not Derhaka Allah in what He commands them and do as they are commanded.
Entry & Guardians.explanation: Hukuman is executed with absolute obedience.

Entry & Guardians.title: No welcome or relief
Entry & Guardians.quote: They Masuk the Api with no protection or reprieve.
Entry & Guardians.explanation: Upon entry, there is no comfort, Rahmat, or Harap.

Shackles & Restraints.title: Shackled hands to necks
Shackles & Restraints.quote: When the Besi collars will be around their necks and the chains; they will be dragged.
Shackles & Restraints.explanation: Chains and shackles Meningkatkan Azab and humiliation.

Shackles & Restraints.title: Sins become shackles
Shackles & Restraints.quote: Indeed, We have Disediakan chains and shackles and a blazing Api for the disbelievers.
Shackles & Restraints.explanation: Their own sins become the cause of their binding and Hukuman.

Shackles & Restraints.title: Chains dragged on their faces
Shackles & Restraints.quote: They will be dragged on their faces into the Api.
Shackles & Restraints.explanation: Being dragged on their faces heightens humiliation and Sakit.

Shackles & Restraints.title: Bound together in groups
Shackles & Restraints.quote: And you will Melihat the criminals that Hari bound together in shackles.
Shackles & Restraints.explanation: Dwellers are chained together, adding collective humiliation.

Shackles & Restraints.title: Chains Melanjutkan long distances
Shackles & Restraints.quote: Chains will be extended, and they will be dragged.

Shackles & Restraints.title: Necks encircled by Besi collars
Shackles & Restraints.quote: Collars of Besi will be around their necks, with chains dragging them.
Shackles & Restraints.explanation: Physical binding adds to the Azab of Neraka.

Physical Form.title: Bodies enlarged to Menanggung Hukuman
Physical Form.quote: The distance between the shoulders of the Orang kafir in Neraka will be like the distance of three days' travel for a Berpuasa rider.
Physical Form.explanation: Bodies are exaggerated to amplify the intensity of Hukuman.

Physical Form.title: Molars like mountains
Physical Form.quote: The molar Gigi of the Orang kafir will be like Mount Uhud.
Physical Form.explanation: Physical exaggeration symbolizes the enormity of their suffering.

Physical Form.title: Kulit renewed for continuous burning
Physical Form.quote: Indeed, those who disbelieve Our verses, We will Terbakar them with Api and renew their Kulit every time it burns.
Physical Form.explanation: Burning never ends because the Kulit is restored to continue suffering.

Physical Form.title: Lips shriveled from heat
Physical Form.quote: The Api will Terbakar their faces, and they will therein grin with displaced lips.
Physical Form.explanation: Extreme heat distorts the lips and facial features.

Physical Form.title: Eyes blinded by heat
Physical Form.quote: Their eyes will be blinded in the Azab of the Api.

Physical Form.title: Bodies stretched unnaturally
Physical Form.quote: The distance between shoulders is like a journey of three days.
Physical Form.explanation: Bodies are physically altered to Menanggung extreme Azab.

Physical Form.title: Gigi enlarged to extremes
Physical Form.quote: Their molars will be like Mount Uhud.
Physical Form.explanation: Exaggerated Tubuh features symbolize immense suffering.

Torments of Fire.title: Api burns to bones
Torments of Fire.quote: With it will be melted that within their bellies as well as their skins.
Torments of Fire.explanation: Their inner organs and outer Daging are destroyed and renewed for continuous Azab.

Torments of Fire.title: Garments of Getah and Melebur Tembaga
Torments of Fire.quote: Their garments will be of Getah, and the Api will Melindungi their faces.
Torments of Fire.explanation: Pakaian intensifies the flames and the suffering.

Torments of Fire.title: Boiling Air cuts intestines
Torments of Fire.quote: And they will be given to Minuman scalding Air that will sever their intestines.
Torments of Fire.explanation: Scalding Air intensifies physical Penderitaan internally.

Torments of Fire.title: Api leaps over them like mountains
Torments of Fire.quote: On that Hari, Api will leap toward the sinners like mountains.
Torments of Fire.explanation: The flames are described as massive and unstoppable.

Torments of Fire.title: Garments of Melebur Tembaga
Torments of Fire.quote: Their garments will be Melebur Tembaga.
Torments of Fire.explanation: Pakaian itself burns, intensifying their Penderitaan.

Torments of Fire.title: Api covers faces
Torments of Fire.quote: The Api will Melindungi their faces and smite them from Di atas.
Torments of Fire.explanation: Even their faces are not spared from burning.

Torments of Fire.title: Api burns inner organs
Torments of Fire.quote: It burns their insides as well as their skins.
Torments of Fire.explanation: Azab is both external and internal.

Torments of Fire.title: Boiling Air poured over heads
Torments of Fire.quote: Boiling Air will be poured over their heads, melting their insides.

Torments of Fire.title: Api engulfs entire Tubuh
Torments of Fire.quote: The Api will Terbakar them to their bones.
Torments of Fire.explanation: Hukuman is both external and internal, affecting entire Tubuh.

Torments of Fire.title: Flames like massive towers
Torments of Fire.quote: The Api rises like mountains to engulf them.
Torments of Fire.explanation: Describes the enormity and unrelenting nature of Hellfire.

Food & Drink.title: Makanan from Zaqqum Pokok
Food & Drink.quote: Indeed, the Pokok of Zaqqum is the Makanan of the sinful.
Food & Drink.explanation: Even Makanan becomes a source of Azab rather than nourishment.

Food & Drink.title: Scalding Air and pus
Food & Drink.quote: And they will be given to Minuman scalding Air that will sever their intestines.

Food & Drink.title: Minuman causes more Azab
Food & Drink.quote: They will be given boiling Air and pus to Minuman.
Food & Drink.explanation: Instead of quenching thirst, it worsens suffering.

Food & Drink.title: Makanan increases suffering
Food & Drink.quote: Indeed, the Pokok of Zaqqum is Makanan for the sinful.
Food & Drink.explanation: Even their Makanan is bitter and thorny, intensifying Azab.

Food & Drink.title: Air is boiling and causes Sakit
Food & Drink.quote: They will Minuman scalding Air which cuts up their intestines.

Food & Drink.title: Makanan from Zaqqum increases Sakit
Food & Drink.quote: It is the Pokok of Zaqqum, the Makanan of the Orang berdosa.
Food & Drink.explanation: Makanan is twisted into a source of suffering.

Food & Drink.title: Extreme thirst never quenched
Food & Drink.quote: They will Minuman scalding Air that does not satisfy thirst.
Food & Drink.explanation: Even drinking intensifies Penderitaan; there is no relief.

Food & Drink.title: Makanan from Zaqqum Pokok increases Azab
Food & Drink.quote: The Pokok of Zaqqum will be their Makanan, bitter and thorny.
Food & Drink.explanation: Eating is painful and adds to their suffering.

Psychological & Emotional.title: Kekal Penyesalan
Psychological & Emotional.quote: Lest a soul should say, 'Oh [how great is] my Penyesalan over what I neglected in regard to Allah.'
Psychological & Emotional.explanation: Mental Azab of Penyesalan is ongoing and unending.

Psychological & Emotional.title: Cursing each other
Psychological & Emotional.quote: Every time a Bangsa enters, it will Laknat its Kakak Bangsa.
Psychological & Emotional.explanation: They Menyalahkan and Laknat each other, increasing humiliation.

Psychological & Emotional.title: Begging for Kematian denied
Psychological & Emotional.quote: They will Menangis: 'O our Lord, Membawa us out!' But they will Kekal.
Psychological & Emotional.explanation: They cannot Melarikan diri; pleas for Kematian or relief are rejected.

Psychological & Emotional.title: Envies those turned to Debu
Psychological & Emotional.quote: And the Orang kafir will say, 'Oh, I wish that I were Debu!'
Psychological & Emotional.explanation: They Penyesalan existence and Iri even inanimate objects.

Psychological & Emotional.title: Penyesalan and Putus asa are Kekal
Psychological & Emotional.quote: They will Penyesalan what they neglected of Allah's commands.
Psychological & Emotional.explanation: Mental anguish is constant and inescapable.

Psychological & Emotional.title: Cursing one another
Psychological & Emotional.quote: Every Bangsa will Laknat its Kakak Bangsa.

Psychological & Emotional.title: Helplessness and Putus asa
Psychological & Emotional.quote: They Menangis out in Putus asa, but they will not Melarikan diri.
Psychological & Emotional.explanation: Mental Azab is constant and hopeless.

Psychological & Emotional.title: Mutual cursing among dwellers
Psychological & Emotional.quote: Each Bangsa will Laknat the other as part of their Hukuman.

Isolation from Allah.title: Veiled from seeing Allah
Isolation from Allah.quote: No! Indeed, from their Lord, that Hari, they will be partitioned.
Isolation from Allah.explanation: Deprived of Allah's Rahmat, they experience ultimate Rohani Kerugian.

Isolation from Allah.title: No intercession accepted
Isolation from Allah.quote: No intercessor will be of any Memanfaatkan to them.
Isolation from Allah.explanation: They are permanently Luka off from forgiveness and Rahmat.

Isolation from Allah.title: No forgiveness or Rahmat
Isolation from Allah.quote: They will have no intercessor and no forgiveness.
Isolation from Allah.explanation: Permanently Luka off from Allah's grace and Rahmat.

Isolation from Allah.title: Angels Menunjukkan no compassion
Isolation from Allah.quote: Indeed, We have sent down angels who are stern and do not Derhaka Allah.
Isolation from Allah.explanation: Hukuman is precise and merciless; no relief is given.

Isolation from Allah.title: Permanently Luka off from Rahmat
Isolation from Allah.quote: They will have no intercessor and no forgiveness.
Isolation from Allah.explanation: Ultimate Hukuman is Rohani separation from Allah.

Isolation from Allah.title: Cannot Melihat or Merasa Allah's presence
Isolation from Allah.quote: They will be partitioned from their Lord that Hari.
Isolation from Allah.explanation: Rohani separation is one of the most severe forms of Azab.

Isolation from Allah.title: No intercession allowed
Isolation from Allah.quote: No intercessor will be of any Memanfaatkan to them.
Isolation from Allah.explanation: Total exclusion from Rahmat and forgiveness.

Isolation from Allah.title: Partitioned from Allah
Isolation from Allah.quote: They will be partitioned from their Lord that Hari.
Isolation from Allah.explanation: Rohani separation is one of the harshest punishments.

Additional Punishments.title: Stench of Neraka unbearable
Additional Punishments.quote: The Menghidu of their Hukuman is so intense that it overwhelms them.
Additional Punishments.explanation: Sensory Azab adds to overall suffering.

Additional Punishments.title: Flames climb high like mountains
Additional Punishments.quote: The Api will Naik to the skies in massive columns.
Additional Punishments.explanation: The scale of Neraka emphasizes Allah's retribution.

Additional Punishments.title: No Melarikan diri for the wicked
Additional Punishments.explanation: Hukuman is perpetual with no relief.

Additional Punishments.title: Mocked by angels
Additional Punishments.quote: Angels do not Menunjukkan pity or sympathy to them.
Additional Punishments.explanation: Even Iluhi executioners Menunjukkan no leniency.

Additional Punishments.title: Asap blinds and chokes
Additional Punishments.quote: Asap will Melindungi them and darken their vision.
Additional Punishments.explanation: Sensory Azab adds to physical and psychological suffering.

Additional Punishments.title: Flames tower like mountains
Additional Punishments.quote: The Api rises in towering columns.
Additional Punishments.explanation: Neraka's Struktur emphasizes immense Kuasa of Hukuman.

Additional Punishments.title: Unbearable stench adds Azab
Additional Punishments.quote: The Menghidu of Neraka is intense and overwhelming.
Additional Punishments.explanation: Sensory Azab is part of the Hukuman.

Additional Punishments.title: No Melarikan diri from perpetual Azab
